modName: Wild Hunter's Shack - A player home for the simple hunter
summary: A small lore-friendly hunter shack close to Halted Stream Camp, in the plains of Whiterun. Suitable for a starter house and for role-playing as well.
descriptionHtml:
[center]







[color=#B45F06][size=6]Wild Hunter's Shack[/size][/color][/center]
[size=5]



[/size][size=3][size=4]Wild Hunter's Shack is a simple yet nice looking player home south of Greenspring Hallow in Whiterun hold. It's been built at the side of a small lake with streams nearby. It's primarily meant to be used by hunters and everybody who'd like to live at this beautiful land, close to nature.
[/size]


  [size=4] [color=#6aa84f][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/size][color=#B45F06][size=5]
[/size][/color]
[/size][list][*][size=3]Lore-friendly[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Several containers, both respawning and non-respawning[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]New hunting bow: Night Hunter[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Crafting stations: cooking pot, alchemy table, tanning rack[/size]
[/*]
[*][size=3]Shrine of Kynareth[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Wood chopping block with a Woodcutter's Axe[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Campfire[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Can be used as a starter house[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Automatically appears on map and can be fast travelled to
[/size][/*]
[/list]


[size=5] [color=#6aa84f]Installation:[/color][/size]


[size=4]Version A[/size]

Installation with Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)[list=1][*][size=3]Install the NMM from [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/?][size=3]here[/size][/url]
[/*]
[*][size=3][size=3]Click "Download with Manager" on the download page[/size]
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Choose the Nexus Download Manager from the action window if your browser asks you[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]In the NMM switch to the "Mods" tab and open the "Unassigned" folder[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Select the mod and click on the puzzle icon with the green arrow[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Enable the mod in the Data section of your Skyrim Launcher
[/size][/*]
[/list][size=4]

Version B[/size]
Manual installation[list=1][*][size=3]Click on "Download manually" on the download page[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Extract the archive using [url=http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm]WinRAR[/url][/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Put the file "Wild Hunter's Shack.esp" in .../Skyrim/data/
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3][size=3]Enable the mod in the Data section of your Skyrim Launcher[/size]
[/size][/*]
[/list]


[color=#6aa84f][size=5] Review:[/size][/color]


                                                           [youtube]SsG0IGItlQ8[/youtube]



[color=#6aa84f][size=5] Suggested mods:[/size][/color]
[list][*][size=3]HD Texture Packs[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Environment mods[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Water mods[/size][/*]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52718/?]ICBINE 2[/url] or any other ENB you prefer
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Lighting mods[/size]
[/*]
[/list]
[size=4]
Bug reports and suggestions are warmly welcome![/size]

[size=4]If you'd like to use/edit my mod feel free to do so but don't forget to give credit![/size]

The ENB cover image and several others were made by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/6472985-rentani/]Rentani[/url]

Thanks for [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCc7TfGs5p1vlzvtFn6S_S1g]KotaGames[/url] for the review!
author: VasAkos
